item.title: 04-名词解释和回答问题
item.author: 作者
item.description: Explanation of Terms 名词解释 ASCII 美国信息交换标准代码 ASCII, abbreviated from American Standard Code for Information Interchange, is a character encoding standard for electronic communication. ASCII codes represent text in computers, telecommunications equipment, and other devices. Most modern character-encoding schemes are based on ASCII, although they support many additional characters. ASCII，是美国信

item.author: 作者

item.title: 02-使用维基百科解释名词和写出英文单词
item.author: 作者
item.description: Explanation of Terms 名词解释 Information 信息 Information can be thought of as the resolution of uncertainty; it is that which answers the question of “What an entity is” and thus defines both its essence and nature of its characteristics. The concept of information has different meanings in different contexts. 信息可以被认为是不确定性的解决方案

item.title: 01-使用维基百科（Wikipedia）解释名词
item.author: 作者
item.description: Explanation of Terms 名词解释 Computer 计算机 A computer is a machine that can be instructed to carry out sequences of arithmetic or logical operations automatically via computer programming. Modern computers have the ability to follow generalized sets of operations, called programs. These programs enable computers to perform an extremely wide range of tasks. A “complete” computer including the hardware, the operating system (main software), and
